name: multilingual search for WPML
author: Mint Asia

sections.description:
It’s 1st plugin to support search content in all different languages, and it can retrieve the search result based on the language of the site

Stay ahead of the competition and tap into a wider audience base by offering multilingual search capabilities. By integrating our plugin, you provide your users with a powerful tool that enhances their search journey, fostering engagement, satisfaction, and loyalty.

Experience the future of multilingual content search today! Contact us for a demo or more information on how our plugin can transform your user experience and drive success for your business.

Usage

Use shortcode [search_custom] add to page.Add query string f to search word.

If search addiction post type please add post_type=”any” into shortcode.

Key Features

  • Integrates with WPML
  • Search another language content and show current language post
  • Sorting function by date/title
  • Highlight Keyword
  • Search analytics
  • Backend administrator adds search record page
  • Can export user search records for a better and intuitive understanding of user needs

Support Post Type

  • Page
  • Post
  • Attachment
  • Other post type
